mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tp_goods(gseq, name, kind, num_inventory, price1, price2, price3, content, image, detail_img) VALUES(goods_seq.nextVal,#{name},#{kind},#{num_inventory},#{price1},#{price2},#{price3}, #{content}, #{image}, #{detail_img})
INSERT INTO goods_banner(gbseq, name, order_seq, image, link, useyn) VALUES(goods_banner_seq.nextVal,#{name},#{order_seq},#{image},#{link},#{useyn})
